name: MY AUTISTIC SELF | A Walking Simulator Game
name_original: MY AUTISTIC SELF | A Walking Simulator Game
description:
This is a game focusing on the autism. 

We narrow it down and try to experience the following points. 

1. Communication -- Hard to put words into sentences. 

2. Recognition -- Focus on details. 

3. Reception -- Automatically amplify or silent the sounds. 

4. Different ways to reconstruct the world: through arts, music, geometrics, physics, numbers, etc.

Designed and Made by a team -- Roy, Sophie, Billy, Binna.
